CustomField.description: This is currently being used to control the behavior when Dealmaker makes updates to the Salesforce opportunity. This setting should be left unticked unless otherwise instructed by your TAS Group engagement manager.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is currently being used to control the behavior when Dealmaker makes updates to the Salesforce opportunity. This setting should be left unticked unless otherwise instructed by your TAS Group engagement manager.
CustomField.label: Run_Opportunity_Update_Without_Sharing
